document.full_text: libya's government said sunday it regretted the attacks on several european embassies, saying its police force was overpowered by crowds angered by a nato airstrike that killed the son of muammar gaddafi.
document.title: libya says regrets attacks on foreign embassies
lines_and_colors: libya's government said sunday it regretted the attacks on several european embassies, saying its police force was overpowered by crowds angered by a nato airstrike that killed the son of muammar gaddafi.
